name: The Curse of The Halfrog - Episode I
name_original: The Curse of The Halfrog - Episode I
description:
The Curse of The Halfrog is an episodic story set in an alternative version of the italian city of Bologna. In this alternative universe, occult magic and a dystopian future coexist, creating a scenario that is inhabited by many bizarre characters. You will play as a young and penniless student, Deccardo, and you must save the soul of your cat, trapped by a curse perpetrated by the dark order of the Galvanists.

In  'The Piazza Verdi Incident' you will meet characters inspired by the colorful Bolognese urban mythology, as you try to solve puzzles in landmark locations of the city. In this demo, you will get to explore the first scenario, the famous, or rather...infamous, Piazza Verdi.

The first episode is under development and currently the demo is available only in Italian. But an english translation is coming soon!
